category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 21 (mandatory committee)
contents: Article 21 (Medical Committee) The Medical Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2023. 7. 5. 1. Cooperation with medical committees such as IOC, OCA, Association of National Olympic Committees (ANOC) and medical institutions of international sports organizations 2. World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) and anti-doping work cooperation with the Korea Anti-Doping Agency (KADA) 3. Deleted July 5, 4, 2023. Work on field support in the field of sports medicine 5. Hosting or support of sports medicine lectures and academic seminars 6. Sports medicine research papers Publication 7. Other matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Medical Committee and submitted by the Chairman 8. Deleted 2019. 1. 31. [This article was added on 2017. 4. 3.]
